psychological_arc.arc_description: Started trusting but learned caution through betrayal

story_summary: agent_004 participated in 18 social interactions. They tried cooperating 27.8% of the time, but were betrayed 5 times. These experiences made them more loss-averse (sensitivity: 3.00). Their trust in others diminished to 0.00.
key_insights: Experienced 5 betrayals but kept trying to cooperate
Developed increased sensitivity to losses through experience
